title: Riot's Response Team
body: During the PROJECT:hunters missions, I had a glitch where my missions wouldn't update for some reason, I created a discussion and got a response. Where the rioter sent through one of the glitches that he had obviously seen. I finished the other missions but I have got no response, and for that reason all my work to get a project skin for free is ruined. If I could please get a project skin token for compensation or something like that would be awesome. Or just any compensation at all would be amazing but, if you do nothing I guess that is fine. For evidence: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4Q0MxEAT-projecthunters-mission-glitch?comment=0000000000000000000000000000

replies.body:
I've replied to your other post already! (sorry it took a bit, you responded when I wasn't working which is why it took a bit longer than usual)

The first mission you had did bug out, but the others didn't complete because you changed your icon to one that wasn't a project icon.
